shortDescription: The WP Fastest Cache plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized data deletion due to a missing capability check on the wpfc_clear_cache_of_allsites_callback function in versions up to, and including, 1.1.2. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers with subscriber-level access to delete caches.
vulnerabilityName: WP Fastest Cache plugin for WordPress wpfc_clear_cache_of_allsites_callback Vulnerability
required_action: Apply remediations or mitigations per vendor instructions or discontinue use of the product if remediation or mitigations are unavailable.
